name: Gurugedara
description: Guru Gedara is a leading platform for interacting with the teachers and students. Meet friends and attend classes in a virtual environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or newer Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
